Player History
Won World Championship with Detroit in 1965...
Injured on 4/23/1967 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against New York (A) on 6/27/1970...
Traded from Detroit to Baltimore on 7/23/1973 (Going to DET: RF J. Clark. Going to BAL: RF J. Northrup, P D. Hughes)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/19/1973, hitting .565 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
